project_abstract.cdata: The additional financing credit would be used to: cover a financing gap in the original Mozambique Higher Education Project (HEP) stemming from cost overruns in the area of civil works and equipment and to scale up successful on-going programs being implemented under the project including the provincial scholarship fund and the competitive Quality Enhancement and Innovation Facility (QIF) and National Research Fund (NRF). The additional financing credit will contribute to further achievement o f the original Project Development Objectives (PDO): (i) to enhance the internal efficiency and expand the output of graduates; (ii) to improve equitable access; and (iii) to improve the quality of teaching and learning and the relevance o f the curriculum. Implementation arrangements o f the additional financing credit will remain the same as the original project.
